name: 胡憲倫
objective:
永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed
schedule:
Week 1 導論-資本主義與永續發展(綠色資本主義/永續發展目標)
Week 2 永續創新及提昇資源生產力
Week 3 生物模擬－師法自然(Guest Lectured by Ms.  Suphichaya Suppipat)
Week 4 服務與流動的經濟(產品服務系統) 
Week 5 金字塔底層及包容性經濟
Week 6 結語及分組報告
scorePolicy: Homework: 45%    Group Presentation：40%   Class Participation & Discussion 15%
materials:
Lovins, A.B. Lovins, L.H. and P. Hawken, A Roadmap for Natural Capitalism, Harvard Business Review, May-June, 145-158, 1999
Senge et al., The Necessary Revolution- How Individuals and Organizations are Working Together to Create a Sustainable World, The Doubleday Publishing Group, 2008 (齊若蘭譯，Peter Senge原著，必要的革命-個人與組織如何共創永續社會，天下文化，2010)
Papers assigned for the class

name: 曾昭衡
objective: 簡介作業研究Systems Analysis中的各式優選工具，並學習混沌理論。以生態族群的Growth and Decay模式為例，初窺混沌世界的奇妙，以提供往後解決問題時有不同的思考方向。混沌理論應用在物理、經濟、生物、數學的領域上，處理數百年來許多無法看透的問題有不錯進展(包括紊流現象)，在環境領域上的應用則尚待開拓。只要處理的系統(問題)具有自我相似性，以混沌來處理是可行的。(課程中將視時間教進階數學軟體Mathematica.)  Explore Chaos Theory from the Models of Growth and Decay (Simple Logistic Model, Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity, Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration).  Introduce important factors of Chaotic Behavior: Dynamics of species, Critical Reproduction Rate, Bifurcation, Butterfly effect.  Examples of Chaotic behavior: Single Species System, Two Species Competition System, Two Species Predator-Prey System.
schedule:
1. 優選工具簡介Mathematic tools for system analysis
　　線性規劃
　　時間序列、啟發式演算法、類神經網路、灰色理論/模糊理論
　　賽局理論、小世界理論
2. Models of Growth and Decay 
　　Simple Logistic Model
　　Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity
　　Logistic Model with Carrying Capacity and Migration
3. Chaotic 混沌Behavior (week 3交HW1)
　　Dynamics of species
　　Critical Reproduction Rate
　　Bifurcation
4. Examples of Chaotic behavior
　　Single Species System
　　Two Species Competition System
　　Two Species Predator-Prey System
5. Butterfly effect蝴蝶效應. Deterministic or Random? (week 5交HW2)
6. Final Exam;
